description.connection: With AdWords conversion tracking, you can see how effectively your ad clicks lead to valuable customer activity, such as website purchases, phone calls, app downloads, newsletter sign-ups, and more.
description.profile: With AdWords conversion tracking, you can see how effectively your ad clicks lead to valuable customer activity, such as website purchases, phone calls, app downloads, newsletter sign-ups, and more.

description.connection: Remarketing shows ads to people who've visited your website or used your mobile app. When people leave your website without buying anything, for example, remarketing helps you reconnect with them by showing relevant ads across their different devices.
description.profile: Remarketing shows ads to people who've visited your website or used your mobile app. When people leave your website without buying anything, for example, remarketing helps you reconnect with them by showing relevant ads across their different devices.

description.connection: ConsentCookie is een dienst voor het beheren en bewaken van uw privacy op deze website.
description.profile: ConsentCookie is een dienst voor het beheren en bewaken van uw privacy op deze website.

description.connection: DoubleClick Ad Exchange connects ad networks, agencies and third-party demand-side platforms with a vast global inventory in real time.
description.profile: DoubleClick Ad Exchange connects ad networks, agencies and third-party demand-side platforms with a vast global inventory in real time.

description.connection: The DoubleClick Floodlight Counter tag allows you to count the number of times that users have visited a particular page after seeing or clicking one of your ads.
description.profile: The DoubleClick Floodlight Counter tag allows you to count the number of times that users have visited a particular page after seeing or clicking one of your ads.

description.connection: The DoubleClick Floodlight Sales tag allows you to keep track of how many items users have purchased, as well as the total value of those purchases.
description.profile: The DoubleClick Floodlight Sales tag allows you to keep track of how many items users have purchased, as well as the total value of those purchases.

description.connection: The Facebook pixel is an analytics tool that allows you to measure the effectiveness of your advertising by understanding the actions people take on your website.
description.profile: The Facebook pixel is an analytics tool that allows you to measure the effectiveness of your advertising by understanding the actions people take on your website.

description.connection: Google Analytics is een gratis website analytics service beschikbaar gesteld door Google. Google analytics volgt, analyseert en rapporteert het gebruikt van de website.
description.profile: Google Analytics is een gratis website analytics service beschikbaar gesteld door Google. Google analytics volgt, analyseert en rapporteert het gebruikt van de website.

description.connection: Use Google AdSense to make money online by placing ads on your website and YouTube channel. Start monetizing your website with Google AdSense today.
description.profile: Use Google AdSense to make money online by placing ads on your website and YouTube channel. Start monetizing your website with Google AdSense today.

description.connection: Google Tag Manager is een tag management service geschikbaar gesteld door Google. Google Tag Manager beheert Javascript en HTML tags die gebruikt worden voor tracking en analyses van websites.
description.profile: Google Tag Manager is een tag management service geschikbaar gesteld door Google. Google Tag Manager beheert Javascript en HTML tags die gebruikt worden voor tracking en analyses van websites.
